short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The G+ lightbox contains a maximize icon that obscures the image and never completely fades out.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides the maximize icon in the G+ picture lightbox view by default and only shows it if you hover the mouse over the bottom right of the picture.
